headline: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) Reports Q1 2025 Earnings With US$8 Billion Revenue Surge
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) recently reported robust first-quarter earnings, with net income rising to $1,379 million from $1,138 million year-over-year, alongside an increase in sales revenue. The company's announcement of a quarterly dividend of $1.045 per share and executive changes, such as Julie Janson's retirement, coincided with a broader market movement. Despite market uncertainties due to tariff discussions and Federal Reserve announcements, Duke Energy's share price advanced by 7%,...

headline: Duke Energy: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Duke Energy Corp. DUK) on Tuesday reported first-quarter profit of $1.38 billion. On a per-share basis, the Charlotte, North Carolina-based company said it had net income of $1.76.
